Title: 13.3.4 The BLOB and TEXT Types
Description: A TEXT column with a maximum length of 4,294,967,295 or 4GB (232 âˆ’ 1) characters. The effective maximum length is less if the value contains multibyte characters. The effective maximum length of LONGTEXT columns also depends on the configured maximum packet size in the client/server protocol and available memory. Each LONGTEXT value is stored using a 4-byte length prefix that indicates the number of bytes in the value.
